data.name: UNO
data.detailed_description:
Comparison Grid


UNO™ Ultimate Edition

UNO™ Ultimate Edition brings together the classic card game and all 9 thrilling DLCs in one complete package.
From DLCs inspired by Mattel's iconic games to Ubisoft's best-loved worlds, each adds a unique twist to the classic gameplay.
Whether you're in the mood for party fun, strategic chaos, or themed adventures, UNO Ultimate Edition is packed with variety, surprises, and hours of fun.

UNO Ultimate Edition features the classic card game alongside nine exciting DLCs:
• UNO is the iconic card game you love, now with new ways to play and connect. Match cards by color, number, or symbol, play action cards to spice things up, and race against others to empty your hand first. Customize your experience with house rules and cosmetic options for a fresh twist on a timeless favorite.
• UNO Flip!™ elevates your UNO matches with a double-sided deck and new action cards, introducing a competitive twist to the classic gameplay!
• Celebrate in style with UNO 50th Anniversary and its gorgeous velvety cards.
• Unleash chaos with UNO Party! Mania™, which introduces 3 new action cards that promise wild thrills and epic comebacks.
• UNO Show ‘Em No Mercy™ turns up the heat with the most unforgiving version yet. Brutal action cards, extreme draw penalties, and knockout mechanics turn every match into a ruthless fight for survival.
• Play like a Viking in UNO Valhalla where the board is part of the gameplay!
• Join the revolution in UNO The Call of Yara, the DLC that brings resource management into the game.
• Play an action-packed game mode featuring characters from Immortals Fenyx Rising in UNO Fenyx's Quest.
• Get ready to move with the UNO Just Dance theme, offering upbeat rhythms, funky effects, and new Theme Cards.
• UNO Rayman adds a playful twist with lush visuals and four unique Theme Cards.


UNO™ Legacy Edition

Dive into the world of UNO™ with the Legacy Edition bundle!

This collection features the classic card game alongside 4 exciting DLCs: UNO Flip!™, UNO 50th Anniversary, UNO Party! Mania™, and UNO Show ’Em No Mercy!™.
With four unique ways to play, UNO Legacy Edition brings extra fun and variety to your game nights!

UNO Legacy Edition features the classic card game alongside four chaotic DLCs:
• UNO is the iconic card game you love, now with new ways to play and connect. Match cards by color, number, or symbol, play action cards to spice things up, and race against others to empty your hand first. Customize your experience with house rules and cosmetic options for a fresh twist on a timeless favorite.
• UNO Flip! elevates your UNO matches with a double-sided deck, introducing a competitive twist to the classic gameplay. Switch between the light and dark sides and get ready to spice things up with new action cards that are wilder than ever!
• Celebrate five decades of one of the most popular card games in style with UNO 50th Anniversary and its gorgeous velvety cards. Plus, add a touch of flair with the special 50/50 card and its Gold Coin rule.
• For those craving chaos, UNO Party! Mania introduces 3 thrilling new action cards: the Point Taken, Wild Drawn Together, and Wild Pile Up cards. Brace yourself for bursts of laughter, nail-biting tension, and epic comebacks.
• UNO Show ‘Em No Mercy cranks up the intensity with brutal action cards, extreme draw penalties, and knockout mechanics. Outsmart your opponents, survive the chaos, and win by emptying your hand or being the last one standing.


About the Game

UNO™ turns the iconic card game into a vibrant, customizable experience.

Match cards by color, number, or symbol, play action cards to spice things up, and race against others to empty your hand first. Don’t forget to shout “UNO!” when you’re down to your last card!

It’s the UNO you love, now with new ways to play and connect.

PLAY IT YOUR WAY

Team up in 2v2, or battle it out in free-for-all matches, either online or on the couch. Combine House Rules like Jump-In and Stacking or 7-0 swaps to create your perfect kind of chaos. For even more variety, expand your game with exciting DLCs, each bringing fresh mechanics and a unique twist to the card game!

COLLECT, CUSTOMIZE, AND SHOW OFF

With MyDesign, you can personalize every part of your UNO experience. Unlock colorful boards, card decks, music, avatars, and more with your coins, and start creating your own game space!

JUMP INTO THE ONLINE FUN

Every week during Happy Hour, a different DLC is free to try. Explore fresh gameplay, wild rules, and themed decks available for a limited time!

Don't forget to join the UNO community on Twitch! Streamers can turn on Chat Chaos mode, letting viewers vote and influence the match in real time. A Twitch extension is also available for even more ways to interact!

data.short_description: UNO™ is the iconic card game reimagined with a large variety of gameplay and customization options. Play solo or with friends, personalize your experience from rules to cosmetics, and try the Happy Hour!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Dutch, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Originally released for Windows 7, the game can be played on Windows 10 and Windows 11 OS
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q9550 | AMD Phenom II X4 945 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTS 450 | AMD Radeon HD 5670 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On Board
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Originally released for Windows 7, the game can be played on Windows 10 and Windows 11 OS
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 530
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 560TI or AMD 5870
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On Board
